data.text:
――It's my day off, and I don't have any plans. 
I'm lying comfortably in bed, when my phone suddenly rings.
data.processed:
󠁿――It's my day off, and I don't have any plans. 
󠁿I'm lying comfortably in bed, when my phone suddenly rings.

data.text: "Hey, Trainer! You in your room right now?"
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: 󠁿"Hey, Trainer! You in your room right now?"

data.text:
"Huh? Man, you shouldn't leave your door unlocked! 
Well, it means you're here!"
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿"Huh? Man, you shouldn't leave your door unlocked! 
󠁿Well, it means you're here!"

data.text: Good morning! It's time to set sail, Trainer! Of course you're up for it, right?
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: 󠁿Good morning! It's time to set sail, Trainer! 󠁿Of course you're up for it, right?

data.text:
Hehe...! You'll see when we get there! 
Don't worry! I brought my adventure map and compass!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿Hehe...! You'll see when we get there! 
󠁿Don't worry! I brought my adventure map and compass!

data.text:
――And that's how I was dragged out of my room on my day off... 
Turns out she wanted to go sightseeing together around the area, 
from tourist attractions to mysterious places.
data.processed:
󠁿――And that's how I was dragged out of my room on my day off... 
󠁿Turns out she wanted to go sightseeing together around the area, 
󠁿from tourist attractions to mysterious places.

data.text:
Anything that invokes her sense of adventure seemed to qualify. 
And so, our journey began...
data.processed:
󠁿Anything that invokes her sense of adventure seemed to qualify. 
󠁿And so, our journey began...

data.text:
This is our first stop. 
What do you think, Trainer?
data.name: Tap Dance City

choices.text: It looks like any old river...

data.processed:
󠁿This is our first stop. 
󠁿What do you think, Trainer?

data.text:
That's what you'd think, right? But apparently, there's a legend 
that if you can skip a stone across this river for more than 10 hops, 
one of your wishes will come true!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿That's what you'd think, right? But apparently, there's a legend 
󠁿that if you can skip a stone across this river for more than 10 hops, 
󠁿one of your wishes will come true!

data.text: Of course, I wish to be a billionaire! What about you, Trainer?
data.name: Tap Dance City

choices.text: For you to win your races... I guess?

data.processed: 󠁿Of course, I wish to be a billionaire! 󠁿What about you, Trainer?

data.text:
Hmm... Not bad, but we're already working on that one right now. 
Don't you have any other wishes?
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿Hmm... Not bad, but we're already working on that one right now. 
󠁿Don't you have any other wishes?

data.text:
Legend goes that any wish, no matter how big or small, 
will be granted! So go ahead and shout out your biggest wish!
data.name: Tap Dance City

choices.text: Then... I wish for a lifetime supply of A5 wagyu beef!
choices.processed: <size=31>Then... I wish for a lifetime supply of A5 wagyu beef!</size>

data.processed:
󠁿Legend goes that any wish, no matter how big or small, 
󠁿will be granted! So go ahead and shout out your biggest wish!

data.text:
Nahaha! That's a big wish, alright! Perfect! 
Now let's get to it!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿Nahaha! That's a big wish, alright! Perfect! 
󠁿Now let's get to it!

data.text:
We ended up spending some time skipping stones together. 
A while later, she took me to...
data.processed:
󠁿We ended up spending some time skipping stones together. 
󠁿A while later, she took me to...

data.text: "Topped with everything an Umamusume's heart desires: Chomolungma Ramen." Yep, I'll have that one!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: 󠁿"Topped with everything an Umamusume's heart desires: 󠁿Chomolungma Ramen." Yep, I'll have that one!

data.text:
A Linear Electromagnetic Induction Accelerator Launched Coaster?! 
Dunno what any of that means. Guess we'll have to ride it to find out!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿A Linear Electromagnetic Induction Accelerator Launched Coaster?! 
󠁿Dunno what any of that means. Guess we'll have to ride it to find out!

data.text:
And so, our journey to anything and everything 
adventurous continued――
data.processed:
󠁿And so, our journey to anything and everything 
󠁿adventurous continued――

data.text: We've arrived at the final destination of today's journey.
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: 󠁿We've arrived at the final destination of today's journey.

data.text: I heard this is the habitat of the well-known cryptid: The Manzanebbogefutamatagancho!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: 󠁿I heard this is the habitat of the well-known cryptid: 󠁿The Manzanebbogefutamatagancho!

data.text:
Well, I don't know the details. 
But... Apparently it looks like a slime, and can talk...
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿Well, I don't know the details. 
󠁿But... Apparently it looks like a slime, and can talk...

data.text:
Hey, don't say that! Sure, it might be a case of 
mistaken identity or a hoax...
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿Hey, don't say that! Sure, it might be a case of 
󠁿mistaken identity or a hoax...

data.text:
But I don't care if it's real or fake. 
I want to pursue my curiosity! I seek the smell of adventure!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿But I don't care if it's real or fake. 
󠁿I want to pursue my curiosity! I seek the smell of adventure!

data.text: As the captain of this ship, I'll assure you there'll be no problems! Now, let us lift the anchor of our curiosity!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: 󠁿As the captain of this ship, I'll assure you there'll be no problems! 󠁿Now, let us lift the anchor of our curiosity!

data.text: ... Hmm? Wait a minute, Trainer!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: 󠁿... Hmm? Wait a minute, Trainer!

data.text: That sound... You heard it too, right? Could it be... the Manzanebbogefutamatagancho?!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: 󠁿That sound... You heard it too, right? 󠁿Could it be... the Manzanebbogefutamatagancho?!

data.text:
Her eyes lit up, and she peered into the bushes. 
Then, her expression suddenly froze.
data.processed:
󠁿Her eyes lit up, and she peered into the bushes. 
󠁿Then, her expression suddenly froze.

data.text:
Uh-oh... This is... 
Imma just... slowly back away...
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿Uh-oh... This is... 
󠁿Imma just... slowly back away...

data.text:
Well, something that's a bit of a problem... 
Listen... I need you to stay calm...
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿Well, something that's a bit of a problem... 
󠁿Listen... I need you to stay calm...

data.text: It's a wild boar!!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: 󠁿It's a wild boar!!

data.text: SQUEAL!
data.name: Wild Boar
data.processed: 󠁿SQUEAL!

data.text: Ack...! Make a run for it, Trainer!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: 󠁿Ack...! Make a run for it, Trainer!

data.text: Shit! It's faster than us on this rough terrain! What now...?!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: 󠁿Shit! It's faster than us on this rough terrain! 󠁿What now...?!

data.text: Ah! You're right! That's a great idea!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: 󠁿Ah! You're right! That's a great idea!

data.text: She quickly leaps up to a tree branch and climbs up. At least she is safe now...
data.processed: 󠁿She quickly leaps up to a tree branch and climbs up. 󠁿At least she is safe now...

data.text:
Me, on the other hand... I'm just a human, 
and my strength isn't really something to write home about...!
data.processed:
󠁿Me, on the other hand... I'm just a human, 
󠁿and my strength isn't really something to write home about...!

data.text: ROAR!!!
data.name: Wild Boar
data.processed: 󠁿ROAR!!!

data.text: Grab on, Trainer!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: 󠁿Grab on, Trainer!

data.text:
I was pulled up by Tap Dance City, and the boar misses me by a hair. 
She jumps from tree to tree, while holding onto me. 
In the end, we manage to escape safely.
data.processed:
󠁿I was pulled up by Tap Dance City, and the boar misses me by a hair. 
󠁿She jumps from tree to tree, while holding onto me. 
󠁿In the end, we manage to escape safely.

data.text:
Phew! I think we're safe over here... 
Are you alright, Trainer?
data.name: Tap Dance City

choices.text: I thought I was a goner...!

data.processed:
󠁿Phew! I think we're safe over here... 
󠁿Are you alright, Trainer?

data.text: But damn, that was very very exciting! But I'm glad we made it out there in one piece!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: 󠁿But damn, that was very very exciting! 󠁿But I'm glad we made it out there in one piece!

data.text:
You, who gave important advice in a time of crisis, 
and me, the captain who protected her crew... 
We made it work with our combined strengths!
data.name: Tap Dance City

choices.text: Still, let's never do that again...
Still, let's never do that again...

data.processed:
󠁿You, who gave important advice in a time of crisis, 
󠁿and me, the captain who protected her crew... 
󠁿We made it work with our combined strengths!

data.text:
Yeah, you're right. 
I'm not a fan of getting chased by wild boars either.
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿Yeah, you're right. 
󠁿I'm not a fan of getting chased by wild boars either.

data.text: Pfft. Ahahahaha!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: 󠁿Pfft. Ahahahaha!

data.text:
But man, I sure had a lot of fun today! I really did! 
You know, I realized it again today...
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿But man, I sure had a lot of fun today! I really did! 
󠁿You know, I realized it again today...

data.text: That you're the best crewmate I could ever ask for!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: 󠁿That you're the best crewmate I could ever ask for!
